Summary: Large bright stationary star suddenly moved across the sky rapidly and disappeared at Milky Way.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were star gazing and mentioned that a particular star was brighter than the "North Star." After sevearl minutes, we noticed the star we were talking about started to move at a very rapid pace. It moved in a Southerly direction until it reached the Milky Way. There was a flash of red and then it disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Paynesville
This sighting has never been favorited.
